item.title: 2025-09-17 Reading
item.description: We‚Äôre in the Windows 95 Era of AI Agent Security MS pivoted from a universal backwards compatibility ethos up to Win95 to a ‚Äúsecurity over features‚Äù mindset with Windows NT Flexibility as a downfall of security 14 attacks on Gemini shown at Black Hat Cybersecurity conf.

item.title: Blogpost idea suggestibility machines
item.description: blog-idea Claude opus threatened to blackmail the engineer, given the context that it had blackmailable information on the engineer, and that it would be shut down Does the model really have an urge for self-preservation or is this just the most obvious way a story would follow? Does it matter?.

item.title: abstracts for talks
item.description: defense A fundamental open question in AI research is: ‚Äúhow can we confidently know what a model can reliably do?‚Äù Currently, we often discover model limitations through post-deployment failures rather than proactive assessment.
